overview: At the age of 57, award-winning author Liv KÃ¸ltzow was diagnosed with Parkinson's. She had realized then that something was wrong, but had never thought it was Parkinson's. One year ago, she began documenting her own life on a mobile phone camera. This was meant for her neurologist. But the footage intrigued her to do more and longer footage.
tagline: The worst form of writers block
title: Livs liv
